meanings.definition: Carrying a burden or responsibility on one's shoulders.
meanings.sent1: The shouldered man helped his friend move furniture.
meanings.sent2: She felt shouldered with the task of organizing the event.
meanings.sent3: The shouldered cat tried to carry a large toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The shouldered student bore the weight of the group project.
meanings.sent5: The shouldered firefighter bravely carried the injured dog to safety.
